title: Hunter World Chaebol Household - Novel Updates
tags: Butlers   Calm Protagonist   Hunters   Inheritance   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Orphans   Sudden Wealth   Wealthy Characters
author: 유피린
description:
One day, I, Lee Jeong-Hoon, learned that I was the sole heir of a family that was not revealed to the world.

Suddenly claiming that I am the Lord, I was given a huge amount of fortune to inherit… but  what am I supposed to do now? 

“You can do whatever you wish, my Lord. This family exists for your purpose.”>
